name: Acheron (Zilpio Gaming)
description:
You play as a lost soul trying to cross the Acheron.

During your journey you will meet various souls and take them with you on this journey!

You can choose whether to use their power to make your journey easier, or take more time and try to save them all! the choice is yours!

If you cannot play the game you can watch the speedrun: Speed run

or each lvl: Lvl 1 Lvl 2 Lvl 3

CRASH WARNING

  • Death may lead to a crash XD (i think i fix it, but i am not sure)
  • When Climbing walls somethime the character thinks he has reached the top and try to get himself up XD

CONTROLS

The controls are for both keyboard and Xbox pad (i only have this to try)

  • Move : A, D /Left Analog
  • Jump: Space / A
  • Shoot SoulSphere:  Q or J / R2  ( it was Left Mouse, but only work with double click)
  • Soul Dash: F or K / L2  ( it was RightMouse, but only work with double click)
  • Interact with stuff: E /  X

MISSING

  • Loading Screen betwin each level... didn't have time
  • A proper Main Menu/Ingame Menu... i should disable mouse and reenable during menus  so the normal click would work but it's too late XD)
  • Some more level, or different path to take (you can only take a 2 route in first lvl)
  • Monster Ai, firstly i want to make the enemy more interactive, live shooting fireball and so.... and implement a stealth mechanics, but it was too much
